info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 6:02PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Missoula, Deer Lodge, Granite, northwestern Silver Bow and Powell Counties through 645 PM MDT... At 602 PM MDT, trained weather spotters reported strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles southwest of Ovando to 18 miles north of Wisdom. Movement was southeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Deer Lodge, Drummond, Butte, Anaconda, Silver Bow, Philipsburg, Walkerville, Ovando, Galen, Warm Springs, Gregson Hot Springs, Garrison, West Valley, Finn, Jens, Brock Creek, Bearmouth, Racetrack, Garnet and Helmville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 between mile markers 136 and 228. Highway 12 Garrison to MacDonald Pass between mile markers 0 and 26. Highway 83 between mile markers 0 and 2. Highway 200 E between mile markers 29 and 63. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
